items.title: American Eagle says consumer is slowing down, issues weak guidance
items.content: American Eagle warned that consumers are slowing down as recession fears swirl.
items.contentSnippet: American Eagle warned that consumers are slowing down as recession fears swirl.

items.title: Take a look inside the world's largest 3D printed housing development
items.content: The world's largest 3D printed community is now open and mostly sold. Take a look inside the homes and hear from residents about what it's like to live there.
items.contentSnippet: The world's largest 3D printed community is now open and mostly sold. Take a look inside the homes and hear from residents about what it's like to live there.

items.title: RFK Jr. pressures Big Food to remove artificial dyes in meeting with CEOs
items.content: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. told top food CEOs that he wants "the worst ingredients" out of food.
items.contentSnippet: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. told top food CEOs that he wants "the worst ingredients" out of food.

items.title: Boeing plane prices could increase by millions with tariffs, says AerCap CEO
items.content: AerCap CEO Aengus Kelly joined CNBC's "Squawk Box" to discuss how tariffs could impact Boeing production.
items.contentSnippet: AerCap CEO Aengus Kelly joined CNBC's "Squawk Box" to discuss how tariffs could impact Boeing production.

items.title: Southwest Airlines will charge to check bags for the first time, launch basic economy tickets
items.content: Southwest is getting rid of its policy for free checked bags, ending a more than 50-year perk.
items.contentSnippet: Southwest is getting rid of its policy for free checked bags, ending a more than 50-year perk.

items.title: Southwest Airlines as we know it is over. Here's what's changing, from bag fees to basic economy
items.content: Southwest will start charging customers to check bags, launch basic economy tickets in a bid to drive up revenue.
items.contentSnippet: Southwest will start charging customers to check bags, launch basic economy tickets in a bid to drive up revenue.

items.title: Kohl's shares plunge 20% as retailer gives rough outlook for the year ahead
items.content: Kohl's posted a beat on revenue for the fourth quarter on Tuesday, but issued disappointing guidance for the year ahead.
items.contentSnippet: Kohl's posted a beat on revenue for the fourth quarter on Tuesday, but issued disappointing guidance for the year ahead.

items.title: Dick's Sporting Goods is latest retailer to forecast rocky 2025 as recession fears swirl
items.content: Dick's Sporting Goods issued weak guidance for 2025 as consumers contend with tariffs, persistent inflation and fears around a potential recession.
items.contentSnippet: Dick's Sporting Goods issued weak guidance for 2025 as consumers contend with tariffs, persistent inflation and fears around a potential recession.

items.title: Airline CEOs warn domestic travel demand is slowing
items.content: Airline CEOs say economic uncertainty and a drop in government travel is driving down domestic travel demand.
items.contentSnippet: Airline CEOs say economic uncertainty and a drop in government travel is driving down domestic travel demand.

items.title: Ad spending on women's sports more than doubled last year
items.content: Ads during women's sports programs were 40% more impactful than the average primetime advertisement, according to EDO.
items.contentSnippet: Ads during women's sports programs were 40% more impactful than the average primetime advertisement, according to EDO.

items.title: Delta Air Lines slashes earnings outlook on weaker U.S. demand, sending shares lower
items.content: Delta Air Lines cut its first-quarter revenue and profit forecasts, citing weaker consumer and corporate travel demand.
items.contentSnippet: Delta Air Lines cut its first-quarter revenue and profit forecasts, citing weaker consumer and corporate travel demand.

items.title: Trump finds unexpected ally in auto union leader over tariffs
items.content: UAW President Shawn Fain showed support for President Donald Trump's tariffs, which include 25% levies on automobiles and supporting parts.
items.contentSnippet: UAW President Shawn Fain showed support for President Donald Trump's tariffs, which include 25% levies on automobiles and supporting parts.

items.title: Here's why banks don’t want the CFPB to disappear
items.content: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau and its employees are in limbo after acting Director Russell Vought took over last month.
items.contentSnippet: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau and its employees are in limbo after acting Director Russell Vought took over last month.

items.title: RFK Jr. could further deter childhood vaccinations as rates fall in the U.S.
items.content: Some health policy experts say Kennedy's early moves as HHS Secretary are concerning and suggest that he could undermine immunizations in less direct ways.
items.contentSnippet: Some health policy experts say Kennedy's early moves as HHS Secretary are concerning and suggest that he could undermine immunizations in less direct ways.

items.title: Goodyear Tire's transformation plan is underway — in the sky and on the ground
items.content: Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co. is facing a rapidly changing business with new technologies and increased competition from low-cost countries such as China.
items.contentSnippet: Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co. is facing a rapidly changing business with new technologies and increased competition from low-cost countries such as China.

items.title: Family office dealmaking doubled in February with bets on crab shells, nuclear reactors and more
items.content: From Laurene Powell Jobs to the family behind Lego, the ultra-rich made bold bets in February.
items.contentSnippet: From Laurene Powell Jobs to the family behind Lego, the ultra-rich made bold bets in February.

items.title: Sen. Blumenthal asks Visa for records of its payments deal with Elon Musk’s X
items.content: The Senate request is one of the first signs of scrutiny on Visa after a late January announcement that it had agreed to provide services to X.
items.contentSnippet: The Senate request is one of the first signs of scrutiny on Visa after a late January announcement that it had agreed to provide services to X.

items.title: FAA briefly halts flights to several Florida airports after SpaceX rocket testing failure
items.content: It's the second time this year that SpaceX experienced a mishap during a flight test of Starship resulting in debris raining down.
items.contentSnippet: It's the second time this year that SpaceX experienced a mishap during a flight test of Starship resulting in debris raining down.

items.title: Walgreens to go private in roughly $10 billion deal with Sycamore Partners
items.content: The historic transaction ends Walgreens' tumultuous run as a public company, which began in 1927.
items.contentSnippet: The historic transaction ends Walgreens' tumultuous run as a public company, which began in 1927.

items.title: Gap shares spike 17% as retailer blows away expectations again, showing turnaround has staying power
items.content: Gap has been in the midst of a turnaround under CEO Richard Dickson and has blown away Wall Street expectations for four quarters in a row.
items.contentSnippet: Gap has been in the midst of a turnaround under CEO Richard Dickson and has blown away Wall Street expectations for four quarters in a row.

items.title: Costco reports mixed second-quarter earnings, comparable sales growth
items.content: Costco on Thursday reported mixed earnings for the fourth quarter.
items.contentSnippet: Costco on Thursday reported mixed earnings for the fourth quarter.

items.title: Applebee's owner Dine Brands to lean on value, marketing to reverse sales declines
items.content: Dine Brands is trying to boost sales in 2025 after reporting its fourth straight quarter of domestic same-store sales declines for Applebee's and IHOP.
items.contentSnippet: Dine Brands is trying to boost sales in 2025 after reporting its fourth straight quarter of domestic same-store sales declines for Applebee's and IHOP.

items.title: Women's pro tennis introduces paid maternity leave funded by Saudi sovereign wealth fund
items.content: Eligible players will receive up to 12 months of paid maternity leave and will have access to grants to cover fertility conception and egg freezing treatments.
items.contentSnippet: Eligible players will receive up to 12 months of paid maternity leave and will have access to grants to cover fertility conception and egg freezing treatments.

items.title: Family offices rattled by market swings and tariffs
items.content: Investment firms of the ultra-rich have halted new deals until they get more clarity from the Trump administration on policy.
items.contentSnippet: Investment firms of the ultra-rich have halted new deals until they get more clarity from the Trump administration on policy.

items.title: Macy's turnaround hinges on revamping some stores and closing others. It appears to be working
items.content: Macy's is in the midst of an aggressive strategy to close underperforming stores and invest in better performing locations as it looks to reverse sales slump.
items.contentSnippet: Macy's is in the midst of an aggressive strategy to close underperforming stores and invest in better performing locations as it looks to reverse sales slump.

items.title: Rare Michael Jordan, Kobe Bryant rookie jerseys expected to sell for $20 million at auction
items.content: Sotheby's is auctioning off Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant rookie jerseys. The sale comes as rookie memorabilia sees a surge in popularity and pricing.
items.contentSnippet: Sotheby's is auctioning off Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant rookie jerseys. The sale comes as rookie memorabilia sees a surge in popularity and pricing.

items.title: Trump grants automakers one-month exemption from tariffs
items.content: The White House said it granted a one-month delay for tariffs on automakers whose cars comply with USMCA, which was negotiated during Trump's first term.
items.contentSnippet: The White House said it granted a one-month delay for tariffs on automakers whose cars comply with USMCA, which was negotiated during Trump's first term.

items.title: These are the most competitive rental markets in the U.S.
items.content: Even with a record amount of new supply, demand for rental apartments is soaring. That has the competition heating up.
items.contentSnippet: Even with a record amount of new supply, demand for rental apartments is soaring. That has the competition heating up.

items.title: Abercrombie & Fitch shares plunge 15% after star retailer posts weak guidance for year ahead
items.content: Abercrombie & Fitch's business may be leveling out after two years of explosive growth.
items.contentSnippet: Abercrombie & Fitch's business may be leveling out after two years of explosive growth.

items.title: Novo Nordisk offers Wegovy for less than half the price through new direct-to-consumer pharmacy
items.content: The pharmacy, called NovoCare, will allow patients to pay $499 in cash per month for the blockbuster weight loss drug.
items.contentSnippet: The pharmacy, called NovoCare, will allow patients to pay $499 in cash per month for the blockbuster weight loss drug.
